data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Enrique Peñalver, Antonio Arillo, Xavier Delclòs, David Peris, David A. Grimaldi, Scott R. Anderson, Paul C. Nascimbene, Ricardo Pérez-de la Fuente (2017): parasitised feathered dinosaurs as Cretaceous amber assemblages revealed. Nature Communications 8 (1924): 1-13, DOI: 10.1038/s41467-017-01550-z
